item.title: 门票销售平台 StubHub 申请美国 IPO 显示亏损
item.description: 门票销售平台 StubHub 控股公司提交了首次公开募股申请，披露了 2024 年收入增长但年度亏损的情况。【原文：Ticket selling platform StubHub Holdings Inc. filed for an initial public offering disclosing revenue growth but an annual loss for 2024.】

item.title: 华尔街银行在波动中为杠杆贷款提供优惠条件
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统经济和监管政策的不确定性扰乱了全球市场，包括摩根大通和摩根士丹利在内的华尔街银行对一些杠杆贷款产品做出了有利于投资者的调整。【原文：Wall Street banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Morgan Stanley have made investor-friendly changes to some leveraged loan offerings, as uncertainty around President Donald Trump’s economic and regulatory policies roils global markets.】

item.title: 加拿大历史最悠久的零售商哈德逊湾将于周一开始清算大部分店铺
item.description: 哈德逊湾百货公司（Hudson's Bay Co.安大略省一家法院周五裁定，哈德逊湾百货公司（Hudson's Bay Co., ULC）可以在下周一开始清算除六家门店以外的所有门店，从而结束了这家加拿大历史最悠久的百货公司一家独大的时代。【原文：Hudson’s Bay Co. ULC can begin liquidating all but six of its stores on Monday, an Ontario court decided on Friday, ending an era of department store dominance for Canada’s oldest company.】

item.title: Clearlake 即将以 40 亿美元收购 Dun & Bradstreet
item.description: 知情人士透露，Clearlake Capital Group 即将收购 Dun & Bradstreet Holdings Inc.【原文：Clearlake Capital Group is nearing an acquisition of Dun & Bradstreet Holdings Inc. in a deal that would value one of Wall Street’s oldest data and analytics providers at about $4 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织将在非正式会议上审议 200 亿美元的阿根廷协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，国际货币基金组织打算在下周于华盛顿举行的一次由其工作人员和执行董事会参加的非正式会议上讨论向阿根廷提供新贷款的问题。【原文：The International Monetary Fund intends to discuss a new loan for Argentina during an informal meeting between its staff and executive board next week in Washington, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说巴西铁矿公司将出价 10 亿美元收购欧亚资源矿项目
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，巴西铁业有限公司（Brazil Iron Ltd.）已出价约 10 亿美元收购欧亚资源集团（Eurasian Resources Group）拥有的一个南美矿山项目。【原文：Brazil Iron Ltd. has made an offer of about $1 billion to buy a South American mine project owned by Eurasian Resources Group, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国考虑削减在线销售税以获得美国关税豁免
item.description: 英国政府正在权衡在 4 月 2 日之前减少甚至取消数字服务税的计划，以避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易关税带来的最坏影响。【原文：The UK government is weighing plans to reduce or even abolish its digital services tax before April 2 in an effort to avoid the worst of US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs.】

item.title: Zadeh Kicks 公司老板对 8000 万美元的球鞋欺诈案认罪
item.description: Zadeh Kicks 的创始人 Michael Malekzadeh 承认犯有欺诈罪，并将避免因其网上运动鞋转售平台倒闭而受审。【原文：Michael Malekzadeh, the founder of Zadeh Kicks, pleaded guilty to fraud and will avoid trial over the infamous collapse of his online sneaker reselling platform that reverberated across the market.】

item.title: OpenAI 研究发现聊天软件的使用与孤独之间存在联系
item.description: OpenAI 与麻省理工学院合作开展的一项新研究显示，更多使用 ChatGPT 等聊天机器人可能会增加孤独感，减少与他人社交的时间。【原文：Higher use of chatbots like ChatGPT may correspond with increased loneliness and less time spent socializing with other people, according to new research from OpenAI in partnership with the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.】

item.title: 特朗普顾问呼吁终止小额贷款减税政策，对市场构成威胁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的非正式经济顾问斯蒂芬-摩尔（Stephen Moore）提出取消对市政债券的联邦税收补贴，这对各州市举债的市场来说是一个令人担忧的信号。【原文：Stephen Moore, an informal economic adviser to President Donald Trump, floated eliminating the federal tax subsidy for municipal bonds, a concerning sign for the market where states and cities raise debt.】

item.title: ION 的 Pignataro 计划在希腊海岸建造价值 20 亿欧元的技术中心
item.description: 意大利金融科技大亨安德烈亚-皮涅塔罗（Andrea Pignataro）正在制定一项计划，在希腊海岸建造一个价值 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）的科技中心，可容纳多达 3000 人。【原文：Italian fintech tycoon Andrea Pignataro is developing a plan for a €2 billion ($2.2 billion) technology hub on the Greek coast that would host as many as 3,000 people.】

item.title: 复活节前夕鸡蛋短缺，美国向意大利鸡蛋生产商发出警告
item.description: 美国官员已询问意大利生产商，在鸡蛋短缺和复活节、逾越节等节日即将来临之际，他们能否帮助确保鸡蛋供应。【原文：US officials have asked Italian producers if they can help secure egg supplies amid shortages and upcoming holidays, including Easter and Passover.】

item.title: Calpers 的校友 Musicco 与摩根士丹利的 Ma 共同推出新基金

item.title: 蕾切尔-里夫斯为英国因预算呼吁失误而被迫削减开支做准备
item.description: 本周三，当蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）站在下议院的调度台上发表春季财政报告时，这位财政大臣的目标是解决她自己造成的风险，而这一风险在她的首份预算案后适得其反：为她自己制定的财政规则留出的缓冲空间太小。【原文：When Rachel Reeves rises to the dispatch box in the House of Commons on Wednesday to deliver her spring statement, the Chancellor of the Exchequer aims to fix a risk of her own making that backfired after her inaugural budget: leaving too small a buffer against her self-imposed fiscal rules.】

item.title: 财政部取消对加密货币混合体龙卷风现金的制裁
item.description: 美国财政部表示，将取消 2022 年对加密货币兑换商龙卷风现金公司（Tornado Cash）实施的制裁，因为朝鲜黑客曾利用该服务对被盗代币进行洗钱。【原文：The US Treasury Department said it is removing sanctions on cryptocurrency mixer Tornado Cash imposed in 2022 after the service was used by North Korean hackers to launder stolen tokens.】

item.title: 德意志银行和穆德里克就 6,500 万美元转账起诉 Ambac
item.description: 德意志银行证券公司（Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.）、Mudrick Capital Management 和 Ambac Assurance Corp. 的其他票据持有人起诉该债券保险公司，指控其未经授权向母公司转移 6500 万美元。【原文：Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., Mudrick Capital Management and other noteholders of Ambac Assurance Corp. sued the bond insurer for allegedly making an unauthorized transfer of $65 million to its parent company.】

item.title: 博世通过 110 亿欧元融资交易提高银行信贷额度
item.description: 德国制造商罗伯特-博世有限公司（Robert Bosch GmbH）与银行签署了一项110亿欧元（约合119亿美元）的贷款融资计划，其中包括为其并购活动提供过桥融资。【原文：German manufacturer Robert Bosch GmbH has signed an €11 billion ($11.9 billion) loan financing package with banks, including a bridge financing for its M&A activities.】

item.title: 交易员寻找能吸引系统性买家的股价水平
item.description: 趋势跟踪系统性基金一年多来首次对美股转为净空头，这让华尔街在电子表格上苦苦思索，需要多大程度的反弹才能吸引它们重新成为买家。【原文：Trend-following systematic funds turned net short on US stocks for the first time in more than a year, that’s left Wall Street poring over spreadsheets trying to find how big a rally is needed to lure them back as buyers.】

item.title: 部长称美国-刚果矿产和安全谈判处于早期阶段
item.description: 刚果民主共和国外长表示，刚果民主共和国与特朗普政府就可能达成的矿产和安全协议进行的谈判正处于早期阶段。【原文：Talks between the Democratic Republic of Congo and the Trump administration over a possible minerals and security deal are in the early stages, the central African country’s foreign minister said.】

item.title: 坎特引领向负债累累的加密货币公司提供贷款的新热潮
item.description: 上一次大熊市几乎摧毁了整个加密借贷行业。现在，加密借贷行业正在卷土重来，一批新的债权人希望填补空白，满足市场对债务的长期需求。【原文：The last major bear market nearly wiped out the entire crypto-lending industry. Now, it’s staging a major comeback, with a new breed of creditors looking to step into the void and satisfy the market’s perennial appetite for debt.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯称一切迹象表明欧洲央行将于四月降息经济流
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，目前看来欧洲央行有可能在下一次会议上降息，但他补充说，现在就断言这一举措将会发生还为时过早。【原文：An European Central Bank interest-rate cut at the next meeting currently looks likely, said Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras, adding that it’s too early to say for certain that such a move will happen.】
